description: Advanced Approaches to Massage offers a serene environment focusing on your well being. Owner Su Willson is a massage therapist who has been practicing in Toronto’s Beach community for over 20 years. The clinic offers various modalities to optimize your health, and has a staff of four qualified Registered Massager Therapists.

reviews.title: Best massages that I have had
text: Susierra provides a wonderful massage experience. This really helps with my pain and discomfort.
I try to make it a regular part of my routine.

reviews.title: Magic
text: I came in to see Susierra with a persistent and nagging shoulder (Deltoid) problem. Painful with certain movements. Susierra clearly has a healing touch. Her techniques, gentle yet penetrating. She found and untangled knots that I did not know I had. The relief was palatable and continues to last. I certainly will be back for another magical treatment. Wayne

reviews.title: GREAT MASSAGE FROM EXPERT RMTs
text: For the first time in my life, I have employee extended health coverage, and of course, they run out during the calendar year.  Eager to book some treatments before the end of the year, I booked a massage with Susierra at Advanced Approaches to Massage.  She is such a warm, friendly, and extremely talented therapist.  She was readily accommodating of some touch restrictions: I have over-sensitive feet, but entirely desensitized shoulders.

I left with properly functioning shoulders, and a sense of whole-body calmness.  I was able to purchase the "10" which gets me 10 treatments at 10% off (basically one free massage by paying for nine).  I will definitely be back, and will keep you posted.

reviews.title: Best massage ever
text: I made an appointment with Su Willson after two weeks of agonizing neck and shoulder pain. She worked her magic and today I’m SO much better. She’s an incredibly skilled massage therapist. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Long awaited Relief!
text: For more than 2 years now, I have been struggling with a collapsing chest. This causes a great deal of arm and shoulder pain.  I’ve had a multitude of tests, I’ve been to chiropractors, physiotherapists and fancy downtown clinics, and then I was introduced to Su Willson. Su is the owner of Advanced Approaches to Massage on Kingston Rd. After four sessions with Su, I finally feel relief!  My range of motion has improved immensely, and my pain is manageable and seems to be subsiding!
The clinic isn’t fancy or pretentious, it is quiet and warm with a neighbourhood charm. Sometimes smaller is better say. I have found my diamond in the rough.

reviews.title: Relief is here.
text: Su, staff and "the place" are welcoming, orderly, friendly, informative and accommodating. It's a quiet, peaceful place of meditatively invigorating muscular relief. Simply, great.

reviews.title: Challenging Time - Thankful for Sue !
text: Sue was very knowledgeable and patient with me, with all the aches and pains I gone through . She basically knows the art of healing my body. Very thankful for you service and all the staff are very nice.
Blessing,
Jewel

reviews.title: RMT Nick is wonderful
text: I went in for a 60 minute massage with Nick yesterday and it was the best massage I have had in years. I left so relaxed which was just what I needed. He also gave me some great advice to improve my own self-meditation practice that I tried this morning and it worked. Highly recommend Nick!

reviews.title: World of difference ...now
text: They are masterful practitioners at Advanced Approaches to Massage.  My specific verbal concerns re: flexibility in my hip and legs were quickly assessed and remedied through targeted deep tissues massage.  Running and cycling are now much easier after a exceptional session with Advanced Approaches to Massage.  Clearly their high rating is very much warranted.

reviews.title: Caring and Effective
text: Su and her colleagues are professional and effective therapists.  Su ensures that her clients needs are understood and then works to reach the goal, whether it is pain- or stress-reduction, or increased mobility.  Thank you to Su, Emil and everyone else for the care and attention to your clients

reviews.title: Pure disappointment
text: I went to Advanced based on a referral and requested an RMT who unfortunately was not available at the last minute. I was rebooked with the owner and when I arrived for my much need massage, I was handed off to another RMT without any communication to me. The RMT who did the massage showed up without my chart and was not aware of the back issues I was having (and noted on my chart) and then at the end of the massage, just left the room with no word whatsoever. I was not impressed with the service or the massage. I will not be returning or referring this place. Also, the furniture in the reception area is well worn and does not present well.

reviews.title: Amazing Energy
text: I've experienced a variety of therapists over the years and I must say Su is by far the best. She worked my lower back like no one has before, and opened my chest where I'm breathing fully again. I felt clear and energized after the treatment and can't wait to go back to experience Su's magic again.

reviews.title: Shoulder tension
text: When I came to Advanced Approages to Massage, my main complaint was tension in the shoulders and neck. Now, after seeing Su Willson, my shoulders are no longer up to my ears.

reviews.title: Thank you, Su!
text: A wonderful, caring and relaxing therapeutic massage turned out to be the best thing to do on this grey spring afternoon. A calm and lovely setting (I chose soothing environmental music... ).  I cannot recommend Su's treatments highly enough. Feeling achy? Or just blah? Go! Terrifically uplifting thing to do, whether you are on a work vacation, or just live around the corner!

reviews.title: Excellent massage, rates, service!
text: I am an extremely busy guy.  If it's not in my phone's calendar, it's not happening, quite frankly.  I really appreciate the 5 treatments for 5% off package.  It's affordable, you just pay in advance for the treatments and the total cost works out to be 5% off of each … very convenient, I was able to book all of my treatments, pre-pay for them, enter them into my all-too-necessary phone, and just show up and relax.  Brilliant.

reviews.title: The best massage in this city
text: I've travelled here many times over the years and often get a massage in my 'downtime'.  This was definitely the best massage I've experienced and the staff were a delight.  I believe in sharing good fortune and good finds, so go there lie down and let the world slip away under their care.

reviews.title: Magic Hands
text: Su, and the rest of the therapists at Advanced Approaches to Massage are truly experts at what they do. The service is exceptional and the staff is friendly and very easy to talk to.
The clinic is clean and offers many options for massage.
You set the mood and choose your own music and oils rather than having generic 'calming music' played. By the time the therapists are done with you, you feel like a new person. It's worth every cent.

reviews.title: Best massage in the city..
text: Have been going to Su for a number of years now and every single time I walk out of Advanced Approaches to Massage feeling like a million dollars. Cannot recommend highly enough!

reviews.title: Get yourself to Advanced Approaches!
text: I have been going to see Su at Advanced Approaches to Massage for over 3 years now...and she is by far the best therapist I have ever been to.
I hope that by writing this positive review that it doesn't make it hard for me to get an appointment with her! LOL..just kidding!
Su is also amazing at pregnancy massages...so Dad's to be should take note..this would be a great gift!

reviews.title: massage therapy
text: We have tried various places for massages, but now are regulars at Advanced Approaches. A very relaxing, therepeutic environment. Su and Deborah are our favourites. They are excellent.

reviews.title: Overpriced, really disappointing experience
text: I went for a first time massage recently and although I will say that after a fairly awkward and somewhat bizarre initial exchange, Su did proceed to give me a massage.  At the outset, Su asked me what level of pressure I would like so I responded that I would like to try a "medium" pressure and go from there - not too hard, not too soft.  Unfortunately, for first 15 minutes, Su was only lightly caressing my back. As I lay there wondering when the ACTUAL massage would begin, I decided to delicately suggest "Oh you can probably go a bit stronger."  Su immediately bristled and responded by saying "Well, I'm renowned for my deep tissue work."  I, in turn, responded that I wasn't questioning her ability, I was simply asking her to massage a bit stronger."  Again, she seemed pretty annoyed with that request and mumbled something about how I had asked for "medium."  I answered that again I wasn't trying to be difficult but that in my past massage experiences, massage therapists generally apply pressure and check in every so often to ensure if you want to go stronger or lighter (especially on the first visit!).  She proceeded to tell me that if I wanted it stronger, I had better be prepared for it to hurt a lot more. From there she started to dig in a bit and although there were points where it did hurt a bit, mostly it was tolerable.  That said, apart from the earlier hostility, she was really cold towards me throughout, very detached and very much came across as someone who just wanted to get out of there.  I think the overall takeaway here for anyone reading this is that in my humble opinion, a massage should be a RELAXING experience.  Certainly the actual massage itself should FEEL good but the whole overall vibe and energy in the room is so important too.  All of it contributes to the patron walking out feeling relaxed with all their mental and physical tension having melted away.

When Su finished my massage she basically just told me I could get dressed and walked out of the room.  That was it, I never saw her again.  I got dressed, left the clinic and felt no better than when I first arrived.  If anything, I was even a bit wound up just because I couldn't believe I'd just spent $100.00 hard earned dollars on such an unpleasant experience.

**A note about the cost.  I was asked to pay up front for the service which in 25 years of getting massages, I have never been asked to do.  When I questioned the receptionist about this upon arriving I was told "We don't want you to have to think about money once you are feeling relaxed after your massage."  This was strange to me and also had me questioning afterwards if maybe they just get a lot of first timers who never come back so they just take the money and run (so to speak).  Additionally, outside of exclusive full service spas, I have also found most massages in clinics to range from $75.00 per hour to 90.00 per hour.  Su charges $100.00.  Again, had the massage and overall experience been a good one, I would've thought her expensive but would have swallowed the price without a peep.  After all, sometimes you do get what you pay for.  Not in this case though.  Not only is this too much money for a visit to Su, it's about 100.00 too much.  I won't go back here and I would not recommend it to anyone ever.

reviews.title: Been awhile, same great massage, same friendly staff!  HIGHLY recommended
text: Well it's been nearly 3 years since I've been to Toronto, and I was thrilled to see that my favourite massage service is still up and running in the Beaches!  I rarely have much time to relax, so booking a massage is always a must-do.  The staff are all very friendly as they expertly guide you from the waiting area to the treatment rooms.  The RMTs are very skilled and knowledgeable; they communicate as little or as much as needed -- everything to YOUR specifications!   I must confess, I read over a few of the reviews and I was a bit shocked to see that ANYONE would have a negative experience here -- this is my go-to place for massage in Toronto, and I do highly recommend it!

reviews.title: Su Willson put me in the most Zen state of mind with her healing hands!!  I was transformed to a land of serenity!
text: I'm glad I did enough online research to find Su!  It paid off tenfold!  Her
Clinic is very clean and her staff is super hospitable!!  I have had seen many other RMT's but the care she put forth to help me

find my zen in relaxing my lower back and hips was awesome. Drooling and trying hard to fight losing conciousness whilst she hit the triggers on my neck were unlike anything I ever experienced!  I definitely recommend her to anyone that needs to relax and get away from the every day stresses that comes with Big City Life!!  I will return regularly!  Thanks Su and staff for the most awesome time!!

reviews.title: Delightful Experience!
text: Su Willson is truly an amazing talent. I've seen many RMTs in the city,... and there is nobody out there that understands the body like she does. Her hands and techniques are magical.

reviews.title: Massage by Su Wilson- Beware!
text: I had a massage by Su earlier this month and this was a horrible experience. She was rude, and unprofessional. People say she has the magic touch but I would have to disagree. Her massage was not relaxing, probably one of the worst massages I've ever experienced. Just wanted to share my experience with you all.

reviews.title: Best massage in town!
text: I've had a lot of tension in my back over the past few years and after only one visit I felt like Su managed to work all of it out for me in just one try.. I couldn't have asked for more and will definitely be paying her more visits in the near future!

reviews.title: Best Massage
text: I have been to Advanced Massages twice.  The first time was excellent with Mary.  She gave me a professional deep tissue massage.

The second massage was with Su Wilson and it was the best massage I have had in my life.  I was in a lot of pain before I went and she helped relieve so much of the pain.  She worked on getting a lot of the knots out.  Also, I really appreciated that she did not talk while I was having the massage.
Anyways, wonderful and professional staff that helped relieve so much of my pained sholders and back. Thank you!!

reviews.title: Talented, professional staff
text: I have been to several places for massages, and have chosen to book with Advanced Approaches repeatedly for our family massages. Su and Emil are our favourites, but we have had success with other RMTs there as well. They are very professional and talented with in their massage techniques. Well done!

reviews.title: AMAZING!
text: I had a wonderful experience, Su is absolutely amazing at what she does, Very relaxed and clean enviroment.
I would recommend this place to anyone!!

reviews.title: Perfectly Fabulous-I'll be back!
text: I've had many a massage in many a city and country over the years, and this ranks right up there with the very best of them.  A warm and friendly reception was surpassed only by the great massage that I received at this local spot n the Upper Beaches of Toronto.
I shall definitely be back and would heartily recommend others to do the same.

reviews.title: Fantastic massage
text: First time here. The massage itself was great - even a week later, I can boast about the noticeable results. Su definitely knows what she's doing. Although I love a good full body massage, she focused solely on the "problem areas" and I FEEL the difference. Most of my massages have been relaxing and provide that temporary relief (feel good for a day). This actually provide deep fixing. I will definitely return.

My only take-back on this sparkling review is that I completed an extensive assessment (everything from preference of music to massage choice) and this wasn't reviewed prior to my appointment. I had to answer the questions again - not a huge deal but it didn't feel like she was confirming what I wanted, more like the mandatory assessment wasn't looked at.

reviews.title: The Place to Go
text: Very professional and experienced personnel.  Excellent massage that definitely helps me with my back pain.

reviews.title: Highly Recommended
text: I arrived for my appointment with numbness in my arms. After having Su work on me, I left feeling 100%. It has been over a week and the numbness has not returned. I would highly recommend a visit to Su’s clinic.

reviews.title: Excellent Massage. Wonderful Experience!
text: I have visited Advanced Approach to Massage several times and each time leave feeling completely renewed and revitalized. I had a shoulder issue that would had given me trouble for quite some time. I saw several massage therapists before visiting Advanced Approach to Massage and none were able to give me satisfactory relief.  Su's massages have to helped me to the point that it is no longer an ongoing issue for me. What a welcomed relief! I highly recommend Advanced Approaches to Massage.

reviews.title: Excellent Experience...so glad I stopped in!
text: I would like to praise the excellent massages I recently received from both Lucy and Jasil.  Having never had a massage in my life (long overdue), I had a lot of stress pain, sleeplessness and recently "tennis elbow" pain, which I thought, may be remedied with a massage.  Since my first massage with Lucy, I have had two more with Jasil (very knowledgeable) and scheduled several more; I am really looking forward to my massage with Su, after seeing all her wonderful reviews!  Happy New Year to Shannon, Joy and all the wonderful staff who already went over-and-above to accommodate my requests; looking forward to meeting the whole team at Advanced Approaches!  THANKS--Mary

reviews.title: Very Deep Healing Experience
text: Had a massage at the last minute with Emil on a Monday and he was just wonderful. I am used to having massages and breathe deeply in order to release all my stress while the therapist is working. Even though I had never had a massage from a man before I was able to feel very safe and the experience allowed me to release a ton of stress and tension. It helped me to recover from a traumatizing experience. Emil is gifted. Highly recommend this clinic.

reviews.title: A nearly-annual treat!
text: I just can't visit without writing a review!  Readers will note that I have reviewed this place before.  I work and live in Wales, and my work brings me to Toronto about once a year (usually a conference), and when I'm here, I call in for a massage with Su (or Emil).  Advanced Approaches to Massage has assembled a great team of talented massage therapists (registered, of course) and are now offering Acupuncture treatments as well (with newer staff members Chong Min or Lucy).  At $99/hr for massage (or $110 for acupuncture) the price is very reasonable, and the quality of treatment is superb.  "A serene environment, focused on your well being" … says it all!

Oh, and they have absolutely stunning new treatment tables … with an electric motor to raise or lower the surface (I haven't seen that before) … Su calls them the Porsche of massage tables, and with built-in arm and head rests, I would have to agree.

In the buttons at the bottom, I chose "Not Sure" for "Travelers on a Budget" because, although $99 is pretty much an industry standard, it may be out of range for some, they do have shorter treatments (i.e. 30 min).  I also said "not sure" for "wheelchair accessible" … I have a bit of a mobility problem myself, but with just two steps into the entrance, I don't personally consider it to be a barrier.

reviews.title: the greatest
text: I first visited Su in 1990 and soon I started coming for regular treatments.  Su has been a constant and and active supporter of my health and well-being ever since and has gone above and beyond on many occasions!!  Su is a person of integrity so I am thrilled to recommend her and the colleagues she has selected at Advanced Approaches to Massage: YOU WON’T BE DISAPPOINTED!!

reviews.title: Little piece of heaven
text: Su is amazing, I was so relaxed during my treatment I actually fell asleep.  I would recommend her to anyone I know .  Thank you Su .

reviews.title: Awesome experience...
text: I have had weekly visits to Advanced Approaches for several months and I continue to be impressed.  More importantly, I have experienced marked improvement during that time.
Su takes great care in discussing any particular concerns and targets each session accordingly.  Su has tremendous knowledge and experience and she uses a variety of techniques.
The Spa is located in a quaint Kingston Road storefront and is always clean and well maintained.
The only Con is that it can be difficult to find parking at times...walking is better.
I strongly recommend Advanced Approaches.
